title: Spectator Mode laggy
body: When ever i try to spectate my friends' games, i always get 3-5 fps for the most. It's not a pc problem as my computer easily runs the game at 60 fps solid so i don't know what is going on. Can anyone help?

replies.body: When this happens, are you launching spectate from the Legacy Client or the Beta Client? Does it happen in the other client?
Beta Client. I haven't seen any issues with the legacy client.

It may be an issue with the client having a hard time communicating with your display driver. This could be for a few different reasons, but our [**Framerate Troubleshooting Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) does a great job at covering the most common solutions for this.

Let me know if this caused any change.
